main event: An unidentified white oval object was visually observed near Johnson Island on October 7, 1961.
interesting points: The sighting was not captured on radar or clear photographs., Reflections on a light window were suggested as a possible explanation for the observed object., A filmstrip was taken which showed the object's position changing within the frame., Only one object was reported, and it was described as white and oval., No personnel aboard the aircraft visually saw any strange object during the flight.
witness description: Instructors and personnel involved in a technical representative role did not visually sight the object.
